website_summaries.verdict: Sleek goggles with UV and anti-fog coating.
pros: These goggles block a decent amount of light and are true to their anti-fog claim
The larger design allows them to fit comfortably over small glasses
cons: Some customers found these goggles too large

customer_reviews.title: and they were great. Paying full price for these or other name ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on sale, took them out on the slopes, and they were great. Paying full price for these or other name brand goggles is insane. These are easy to use, fit well over my helmet, and kept vision clear as day. I did have a face mask on at one point, and without proper overlay of the goggles these fogged up pretty quickly. I found that to be pretty annoying, as I had to keep messing with them on the lift to get them cleared and the proper ventilation going. Again for the price, you can't beat it. I only had slight trouble with fogging, with a face mask on.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Product did good! It did fog occasionally but I would still buy these. I don't snowboard much so these are perfect for the look and price I'm willing to pay. Maybe when I start going more, I'll buy more expensive ones but for now these are good. Got complements on them as well. Oh and they also held up well on some pretty narly falls! Very sturdy and Comfortable. And trust me comfort matters. I had some bad ones and it'll ruin your trip if you have to constantly feel the plastic on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very good for use with helmet or over glasses
customer_reviews.text: I returned these goggles. They did not live up to the claims, in my opinion. They did not provide adequate space and comfort to be proclaimed to be OTG (over-the-glasses) goggles. Additionally, the strap mounts close to the rear edge of the goggle frames, rather than the front edge. This means they also don't work as well with a helmet; the thickness of the helmet causes the strap to have to contort at an odd angle coming around the sides of the helmet and then holding the goggle frame in place. This was not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Plumb

customer_reviews.title: Discount made it a good value for money, magnetic clips work great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price. I got a lightning deal which made the combo a good deal. The magnetic clips work great. I have taken great care of them and so I can't tell how good the coating is because I have never let it rub against a surface, even my hands. Note: you just get a pouch with them. It would have been really nice to get a hard case/ 2 bags for them. I wish they would make a clear lens for these goggles, i would buy one
customer_reviews.author: Ashish B George

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have only used them once, but I liked them. The lens color probably wasn’t right for the conditions, though. When looking brought them hey were a yellow tint. It was a snowy day and it was hard to see depth. But the conditions were pretty bad. The size was good. I have a large head, xxl helmet, and they worked well. They still had a slight oversized look. Way better looking than my old school style ones with a visible frame. They stayed on the helmet with no problems. I didnt have any problems with them fogging up. They did allow some air in during high winds, but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Klein

customer_reviews.title: These look good but the field of vision is no better than ...
customer_reviews.text: These look good but the field of vision is no better than old-school goggles. They also seem very fragile and will scratch very easily. The lack of a frame doesn't help their fit, either. I had significant gaps between the foam and around my nose as well as near my temples. No good for their intended purpose unless you just want them for the look.
customer_reviews.author: mike n

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: These are some truly amazing goggles! I bought these goggles as I was in need on a brighter lens color to allow for more light intake and they work great! They function just as well as my nicer pair of goggles from Anon! They dont fog up, they fit great, I can see even when its cloudy out, and their relatively cheap! I would definetly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Mickels

customer_reviews.title: Meh, but better then rentals
customer_reviews.text: These goggles fit fine, but the lens quality leaves something to be desired. If you face plant a lot or don't treat your gear right, then these are the googles for you! I returned one of the two pairs I purchased as they just did not fit my wife correctly at all. It would be great if there was a SIZING CHART of some kind for the 3 or 4 diffrent styles of Zionor goggles sold here.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K.

customer_reviews.title: Prevented Sun from Triggering Migraines! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this version: B1-XA-Polarized Silver VLT 8.4% I was worried the bright sun reflecting off the snow would trigger my migraines, which are very sensitive to sunlight. Not only do these fit my wrap-around sunglasses inside them but there were times that I didn't even need the sunglasses. These babies did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: I used these about 3 times skiing and the lenses ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these about 3 times skiing and the lenses are already ruined. Whatever coating was on the lens is coming off and its difficult to see through them now. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Rana

customer_reviews.title: Cool but not cool.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my ski trip last year and loved the way they looked. Even bought a pair for each of my kids for Christmas. I loved the way they looked and felt and my kids did too, but my goggles lense cracked for no apparent reason the first time I used them. I was looking at purchasing the new magnetic type, but I’m a little reluctant. I have not contacted Zionor about a replacement lense yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ben K.

customer_reviews.title: Good mid-range tint
customer_reviews.text: Fits well with a helmet, the tint is just right for being able to transition between sunny and cloudy/snowy days. It's a good mid-range tint. Also, the inside part is large enough that I can wear my glasses under them which is a plus because I don't always feel like using contacts.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good price, but not great optical quality and limited lens options
customer_reviews.text: The optics were a little weird on this lens. I returned them because there didn’t appear to be any way to order a yellow lens. There are so many models of this goggle that look similar it’s hard to tell what’s available. But they were a good price at the time so I figured I would try them.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent goggles
customer_reviews.text: These aren't very expensive but perform extremely well. I bought them as a back up to my really expensive goggles and I find myself choosing these because they did with my helmet better and never fog up.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for the ski-season and just used them for a multi-day trip to Vail. I used them with a new Zionor Lagopus H1 Ski Snowboard Helmet (see my review). They worked great. I liked the view, light variation, and function. Although I didn't get too crazy, I had a couple wipe-outs and they held up. Had to be careful of twisting/torqueing them so the lenses would not come loose from the clips. Other than that, I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: R-N

customer_reviews.title: X5 goggle
customer_reviews.text: I got the X5 goggle. They work great and hardly fog. They only fog when I have my thick face mask up and breath hard. Other than that they do not fog. You can see everything, very wide view range. My only complaint is that they don’t sit perfect on your face, the X5 goggles don’t seat on the side of your face that well. My girlfriend has the X4 goggles, I have tried and used those and they are amazing, they are extremely comfortable and seat perfect. I’d recommend the X4 over X5 if You are looking at these goggles.
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: The goggles is great for blocking sun and it is very light weighted
customer_reviews.text: I originally brought this for my BF for our snowboarding trip to Jiminy Peak. The goggles is great for blocking sun and it is very light weighted. Moreover, it comes with a carry pouch for the goggles that you can protect the lens from scratching. The whole black design are super cool and works with both men and women.
customer_reviews.author: Suan Liu

customer_reviews.title: Fit rental helmet perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a charm. did not fog at all. was great on a sunny day and still very good on a cloudy day. tip. make sure it sits flush with your skin. i had it sitting over my facemask, and my nose breath did fog it up some. i adjusted the nose mask away and it was fine the rest of the time.
customer_reviews.author: djwtbp

customer_reviews.title: Large viewing area with few blind spots.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value for the money. I use them for working outdoors in bad weather doing snow removal and vehicle recovery. The large field of view is great even in low light conditions. The only thing I would change would be to include a clear lense for using them in the dark. Obviously this would increase the price somewhat, but there's added value in versatility.
customer_reviews.author: angrymotors

customer_reviews.title: Functional and still able to annoy
customer_reviews.text: The goggles provide full face protection while affording a wide range of view. I am replacing a set of early 2000 reflective orange sunglasses with these goggles, so I feel that I am able to vastly improve functionality while maintaining a similar, yet updated level of "douchiness" with these goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Very crisp on a sunny day
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Skied a day that started out very sunny. Very clear optics. As the clouds came in towards mid afternoon the light was a little flat for these. I guess I will just have to get another pair with the cloudy day VLT %
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Scratch way too easily
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look but they scratch WAY too easy. I got them for a trip to Colorado recently. I had read a couple reviews stating that they scratched easy, but thought it was probably due to people not keeping them in the protective pouch. I was wrong. I stored mine in the pouch provided and even placed the spare lens in a different (Oakley) pouch. However, once I put them on before my first run, there was a giant scratch in the middle of the silver reflective lens.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Not too much good
customer_reviews.text: I used this item 4 times actually and all the time, it got foggy and I can barely look to forward while skiing.It was not much more comfortable than I expected.Also its head band is not fitting on my head properly as I want to do as.
customer_reviews.author: Enes Kon

customer_reviews.title: If you are unsure don’t hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from skiing Killington with these goggles yesterday. The guns were blasting and it was very windy so they hit a solid test. They are very good on contrast, not too dark and don’t flatten too bad. They don’t hurt your nose and did not fog even with a gait or above not nose bridge. They cleaned up quick and were very breathable. Overall I am glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: LAmazon Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of these are amazing. I had put on a couple of other pairs of goggles and they were tight on my nose. These were actually loose, I was worried too loose, around my nose, but I like the feel much better. Did I say I love the look?
customer_reviews.author: PS_in_Idaho

customer_reviews.title: The Zionor XA Ski Snowboard goggles look great, comfortable to wear and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: The Zionor XA Ski Snowboard goggles look great, comfortable to wear and reasonably priced. The polarized lens is crystal clear even on a sunny day. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles
customer_reviews.text: Overall i really like these goggles, they fit really good and they have a really nice strap that does not slit on my helmet. The vision out of them is great as well, really good side vision and they are not to dark so when the sun goes in you can still see. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ayrton

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Look Like What is Shown!
customer_reviews.text: They sure don’t look like this picture! VERY disappointed 😞 And they ship them to you in a flimsy barely padded envelope. Not sure if I will keep or not as they are for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Elliana

customer_reviews.title: They fog up fast and stay fogged up.
customer_reviews.text: They look good and they will feel good when you start the day. But by the end of your first run, they will fog up and you will go and buy a better pair for way too much money at the base of the mountain. Do not buy unless for a costume.
customer_reviews.author: waltPM

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these goggles for my ski trip to Tahoe. They were grate! They fit well with my net Smith helmet and have a very large field of view. Larger than normal goggles. I skied in many different conditions (as anyone who has skied at Heavenly will agree) and they never fogged. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ludlow

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these Thanksgiving weekend 2016 in Breckenridge. Worked FANTASTIC!!! Did not fog up on me, temps were fairly warm. Sunny and overcast days. Great vision with the wide angle lense. Also kept the wind out when it was blowing very hard one day. They also looked very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kraig Vanderbeek

customer_reviews.title: Fogged a little but well priced
customer_reviews.text: I use the goggles when I snowboard and they worked great. My only complaint was that when the temperatures dropped to about <= 0 the top half of the goggles started to fog over where as my friend's goggles did not (he had Smith optics I think). However, I typically only make it out between 2-5 times a year so they're well priced for how much I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the magnetic lenses
customer_reviews.text: I love the magnetic lenses. Very easy to interchange the lenses on the fly. I only wish they would have sold the goggles and two lens combo with one high light and one low light lens. I have been out anowboarding once with them this far and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Colorado resident who spends 2-3 days a week on various mountains in varying conditions- these things are a GREAT DEAL for the money
customer_reviews.text: Don't pass this deal up! Colorado resident who spends 2-3 days a week on various mountains in varying conditions- these things are a GREAT DEAL for the money. Fit/Comfort/Look/Style all excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BMR

customer_reviews.title: they fog up way too easily no matter the weather and it seems like once ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these goggles a few months now and I think it's safe to say the quality of them is a problem. they fog up way too easily no matter the weather and it seems like once the Moisture gets in, you can't get it out. I would recommend "Be Nice" goggles. There normally Equal in price And they perform like top of the line equipment. Only down Side I've found to "Be Nice" is it seems you can't buy the lenses by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Josey

customer_reviews.title: Solid constrution, could be darker.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as dark as I would like, but given what I paid during an Amazon Lighting Deal, I cannot complain. Solid construction, very good optics, not a piece of junk by any stretch; honestly, quality-wise, it compares very well with two hundred-dollar Oakleys, etc. I would definitely buy Zionor googles again, and am buying one of their helmets, in fact.
customer_reviews.author: Kajetan Wojciechowski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Coming with 2 lenses for different conditions is crucial. Just note that after a season of use the foam around the edge will start to break and come off.
customer_reviews.author: ZackD

customer_reviews.title: Great first goggles
customer_reviews.text: It was my boyfriends first year skiing but these worked great, they looked really nice! Fit comfortable and worked well. Great for the price and he even got a lot of compliments for them.
customer_reviews.author: Don Theobald

customer_reviews.title: So worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Man. I was skeptical. Tried them out today in the worst possible conditions. They were amazing. The lens: I was worried it would be clipping out often but it didn’t move or even let any water through. I purposefully tried to fog them up and they unfogged super quick. Fits super comfortably. I have zero complaints. For the price you cannot beat this.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Tripunov

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of this goggles, they’re pretty nice for what you pay.. really clear they don’t look cheap either. I own a pair of Oakley’s Prizm and they compare really well and for a quarter of the price, the only thing that bothers me is that the frame is in the way a bit but I have a larger head.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Brought this goggle to Snowbird, Utah. Fits my SMITH helmet and accommodates my glasses. Great price when compared to comparable goggles. I will make my fellow Ski Patrollers aware of this product.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo
customer_reviews.text: When I was first looking at these goggles I was under the impression from the photo the lens on these were blue. Loved it! So I ordered. When they arrived what I recieved was a shiny black lens. ??? I thought someone had made a mistake until I realized the blue in the photo is a reflection of the area. I think they could have added some other photos to show what the product really looked like.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyC

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Looked good, felt goood, amazing unlimited field of vision. I willl definitely buy these for the rest of my family. My wife bought a pair at the slopes for 5 times the price of these and would rather wear mine.
customer_reviews.author: GREGORY BASS

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool... but that’s it
customer_reviews.text: So this goggle looks super cool but within the first couple times wearing it, the lense popped off and wouldn’t pop back on. I wouldn’t recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted, great quality
customer_reviews.text: These goggles were great. I bought 2 pairs for myself and my son and we couldn't be happier. They came in a cloth bag and when unpacking they seemed high quality. The inside of the strap has rubber grip on it that really grabbed our hats. The blue lens looks awesome and people said the reflection looked cool. They worked perfect to filter out the sun while skiing. The best part was that they did not fog up like my old ones. I put these on par or better than Oakleys. They may look big, but you'll appreciate how much you can see.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stark

customer_reviews.title: These will make good backup goggles
customer_reviews.text: I haven't skied with them yet, but just from handling them I rate the quality is clearly mid to low end. These will make good backup goggles.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mac Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles but having issue with water and moisture
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful deal for some awsome goggles. My boyfriend liked his so much I bought myself a pair. After this weekend though, and damper conditions water and moisture got inbetween the lenses making it impossible to see. The seal on the lenses seems to not be complete. Unknown of what I should do to fix the issue and continue to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tint
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for night skiing in Keystone and day skiing. Didn't fog up, fit perfectly on my big head. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Honestly Best Snow Googles Ever
customer_reviews.text: They look cool and they do the job perfectly. When you look out of them it's like wearing a pair of sunglasses so if you have a blue lens, its dark on the side you are viewing from. You can also change out the lenses if you buy another pair. They're very durable and surprisingly don't even fog up at all. I directly breathed on the lenses and the fog dissipated almost instantly. A lot of value; I highly recommend buying these for skiing/snowboarding.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these two years ago because of the great price and I couldn’t be happier! An avid skier, I have used these a bunch the past two winters and have had amazing success! Rarely fog, easy to clean, great view, etc!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Zionor X3 Extra Magnetic Lenses Can Be Changed Easily/Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been snowmobiling yet but love the Zionor X3 magnetic lenses that can be changed quickly - even with gloves on. I got the black silver and all yellow lenses. These are large enough that I can wear glasses under them. If your using a helmet make sure they fit into the opening. They come with a storage bag too. $45 well spent.
customer_reviews.author: ladyofthelake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sunny slopes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of two reasons. 1) polarized and 2) anti-fog. I finally got to use them and they were awesome. I was able to see the contours of the slopes and had no issues with the goggles fogging up. What makes these special is that they are reflective enough to use as a mirror. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Mel D.

customer_reviews.title: Great ski goggles, great price.
customer_reviews.text: These are great ski goggles and a great price! They did not fog up and visibility was great. I will buy them again when I need an economical option.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles - my son loves the mirrored coating
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles - my son loves the mirrored coating, and even on the darkest, snowy-gray days the lenses still provide light to read the terrain. They didn't fog up, and wear really well.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Works great; needs protector for extra lens
customer_reviews.text: Just used both lenses for three days at Jay Peak. Worked very well. Would've been five stars, if they also came with a separate bag to hold the second lens; not sure how to prevent the extra lens from scratching the one that's attached to the goggles, when both are stored in the bag while *not* wearing the goggles.
customer_reviews.author: William T Coolahan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a ski trip in Colorado and wow. These goggles are probably the best goggles I've ever used. Never fogged up the entire trip, and very comfortable! Would recommend for any beginner-intermediate level skiers. For the money they are definitely worth it. The value you get is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: James K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these goggles and they are super stylish! I have an expensive pair of Oakley goggles but so far these have a much better sight range and are easier to see out of. They work really well out in the cold weather and don’t fog up which I love! Definitely worth the money and a great pair of backup goggles!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great quality snow glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. Very high quality and they were a daily deal!!!! I’m a Florida girl going for a 4 day “ski” vacation. I didn’t some that were this high quality BUT they cost the same as the cheap ones. So why not??!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan54

customer_reviews.title: Item pictured is not even close to the product you receive!
customer_reviews.text: The goggles that came are the wrong color and look absolutely nothing like the ones pictured. The promised same day shipping but they actually took 3 days. They show mirrored lenses but not mirrored at all. Pictured are frameless lenses but theY are not. You get what you pay for, these are a cheap pair of goggles that I would be embarrassed to wear. So very very very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Good goggles for $45
customer_reviews.text: Good goggles for $45.00. Don't ever pay full price for these goggles. Overall quality does even come close to Smith or Oakley.
customer_reviews.author: M. Otten

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the Groomers
customer_reviews.text: Stoked to get these goggles, because of the first pair that I had that we’re the same model, but these ones had the low light frames so I decided to get them. I used them three times and on the fourth trip, the foam liner started coming off. A significant amount of snow finds its way in too. Good goggles, but only if it’s for groomers on a bluebird day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Goggles
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on these goggles almost every time I go out. The only reason I am giving it 4 stars is because they say that the lenses are interchangeable but I can't seem to find this exact lens anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Austen Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: We bought two pair on deal of the day for family members for an upcoming ski trip. They came well packaged and are clear when looking through them. Now we will have to see how they work on the slopes.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne G. Wills

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This googles are amazing! Great quality. Much better than what I was expecting. Almost everyone had them at the slopes.
customer_reviews.author: aldy22

customer_reviews.title: Great goggle for the value
customer_reviews.text: We got a great price on these goggles, which helps with the five star review. Lens are pretty nice quality and do not scratch very easily. We have used these over 15 times now and they have been great. They will fog up on a really humid day, but has rarely been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: "dandertz"

customer_reviews.title: The goggles look cool wasnt expecting the lens to be yellow when i ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt sure what to expect when i it arrived. The goggles look cool wasnt expecting the lens to be yellow when i bought them but they will do i'll just wear my sunglasses till it gets darker. I'll rewrite my review when I actually get to use them on the slopes. It would be nice if they pout in the directions how to change the lenses so I can purchase other lens.
customer_reviews.author: Jace Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Great googles
customer_reviews.text: My son and I each have been wearing these for the last two seasons. Excellent googles, only fogged up a little around the edges in -10 night time skiing. I bought another pair for atving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of goggles, definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great ski goggles! I like the dome view as it provides a greater field of view! I like the mirror finish. It fit comfortably even over my helmet. I had no air seeping thro the foam causing fog to build up so I was completely satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ryan gray

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These goggles would constantly fog up. I wound up creating my own vent holes on the top and bh bottom just behind the lens. The frame was also always in my view so vision was a bit limited. I would definitely recommend to anybody to ho ahead and spend a bit more money. It will be worth it on the slopes.
customer_reviews.author: albert mazurkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very cool looking goggles. I used them on hunter mountain in NY and they were awesome! Great goggles for an awesome price
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandson who is a snowboarder and he thought they were very good, liked the color and is using them as an extra pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: but I thought it would be perfect for bright sun and snow
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the lenses was very bright yellow on the inside that it was almost blinding, but I thought it would be perfect for bright sun and snow. Sorry sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Wide frame good for glasses plus gogglsz
customer_reviews.text: Great if you need to wear glasses under your goggles
customer_reviews.author: K. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I used these goggles for 2 winters in Northern New Hampshire and I was blessed to have them! Anti-fog, clear view and help from the sun. I used them all season around when it was snowing, raining or sunny. Didn't have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for those skiers in your life. Keeps the glare out. Lightweight comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Alison Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cannot beat these goggles, they work great. WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT TOUCH THE INSIDE OF THE LENS OR TRY TO CLEAN. IF YOU WIPE IT WILL SMEAR THE ANTI FOG COATING.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Very nice although my son could not use them
customer_reviews.text: Very nice although my son could not use them, too big for his helmet. Tried to sell them to someone else and they would not fir with their helmet either. Nice glasses though, would be fine for skier or snow boarding with out having to wear a helmet
customer_reviews.author: MAMMA V

customer_reviews.title: The value is there.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for myself. As a Floridian, I don't make it to the slopes very often, so the need for an expensive set of goggles isn't necessary. These goggles worked well and didn't fog, which was my big worry. The lenses did scratch fairly easy, but, hey, for 40$ whatya gonna do.
customer_reviews.author: david a bramblett

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you pay attention to the lens you are buying.
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles. Never fogged up on the slopes. The only issue I had was the fact that the pictures depicted an "easy" removal of the lens to clean or replace. This is not so easy to do. Just make sure you review what you are buying and see if all the features you want are present.
customer_reviews.author: Austen

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and good performance
customer_reviews.text: Purchase fees for my daughter for Christmas. Very pleased with the quality, especially for the price. My son bought a more expensive pair of goggles with interchangeable lenses and he would said he would have been just fine with these.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Gets a gold medal!
customer_reviews.text: I was inspired by Lindsey Vonn's awesome goggles. I don't ski - :0 - but during the next snow storm, I'm going to look super cool waiting for the bus! Oh, and the price was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amelie

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles, my only complaint is that I get ...
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles, my only complaint is that I get a little bit of leakage when wearing with a helmet for snowmobiling. I probably need to tighten them a little.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cauthen

customer_reviews.title: Good value overall
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the quality I was hoping for in terms of durability, but for the price I didn't expect anything more than I got so I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse McBrower

customer_reviews.title: I see the light!
customer_reviews.text: These were great goggles! Can’t get over how great the lens was.
customer_reviews.author: Stop killing Gingers to make Ginger Ale

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I read through the reviews and took a chance with these goggles as I am not familiar with the brand, they are great!! I haven't tried the yellow/ night time lens yet, but the silver tint lens was great for a day at Whistler.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Huuuge
customer_reviews.text: this glasses is huuuuuge. maybe for big men, not for women definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to everyone......
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and high quality ... the black color I got looks sooooo cool . I got the for my husband and he loves it . Can’t wait The day go snowboarding .highly recommended to everyone ....
customer_reviews.author: Monly

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a female and love these, and I know guys who love them too. They're not too big - they're the perfect size and hug my helmet so my forehead doesn't get cold. Worked great for a few days out in Vail. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with these goggles. For the price, the quality is pretty incredible. I've taken them out on sunny and cloudy days and have been able to see great all day long. No fogging issues whatsoever. Highly recommended. Just wish they would add more stand alone lens colors so I can have multiple looks!
customer_reviews.author: Bo Beard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice ski goggle. can adjust the tightness. The black color goggle looks better than the picture
customer_reviews.author: Hao Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific googles for an amazingly low price. 2nd pair (so cheap I got this pair with a different lens.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks like the fabric is not the best and wont last. But the price is fair, ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Matias

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but lens apt to fall off when you put it up on your helmet
customer_reviews.text: Lens pops off sometimes when I put the goggles on up on my helmet
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Lens are clear
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Lens are clear. Not a lot of fogging up. The foam isnt very good. Its too thin so the plastic is rubbing on my cheecks. Theres a piece of foam missing on each side. I thought the foam should be around the entire frame?
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: everyone is jealous. I use them for biking in the winter but they seem suitable for anything winteresque
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good pair of snow goggles
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good pair of snow goggles. The only drawback is that the selection of replacement lens options for dark or low lighting (night snowboard/skiing) is not available - hope it comes out eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Kamekazi

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. Tried them out for the first time today. They look very cool, he loved them, a d they showed up sooner than expected. 5 stars well earned.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, nice fit, handy carrying bag. Easy to see through
customer_reviews.author: philip mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Lenses are good, quality is good for the price I paid ...
customer_reviews.text: Oversize so it's an option for those with glasses. I do not wear glasses so can't speak to its use with them. Lenses are good, quality is good for the price I paid ($33). The strap needs to be worn tight for optimal side fit without a helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J.

customer_reviews.title: These are great goggles, but you can't get replacement lens
customer_reviews.text: These are great goggles, but you can't get replacement lens. I have the polarized lens, and I can't find replacement lens anywhere. Not worth the cost if you can't replace the lens if they get broken or scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Santostefano

product_meta.title: ZIONOR XA Ski Snowboard Snow Goggles for Men Women Anti-Fog UV Protection Spherical Dual Lens Design
feature_bullets: TOP NOTCH QUALITY SKI GOGGLES - Ski & snowboard goggles designed for teenager and adult unisex with Italian inner lens, durable TPU frame and high quality sponge.
FULL EYES PROTECTION - Dual-layer anti-fogging, anti-glare and UV400 Protection coating with super cool full REVO reflective lens.
MORE SAFETY & SOLID - Ruggedized lens with ZIONOR special EDT (Enhanced Durability Tech) for better impact-resistance and protect skier and snowboarder.
COMFORTABLE AND PERFECT FIT - Triple-layer high density and soft sponge to keep your warm and two way venting system to exhaust the heat when skiing and snowboarding.
Customer Oriented Service - All ZIONOR snow goggles are designed for both men and women, we provide swift response customer service if there is anything you need.
